title: Jinx is MF V 3.0
body:
Better and more reliable passive
Higher AoE damage
Better AS steroid
Better self peel and more CC
Better waveclear
Higher damage and instant non-channeling global execution ult
Higher AA range.
Better early, better mid and better late game (hyper carry)

can we give MF a niche so that she's not completely outdated?


EDIT: 3.0 because Graves already was 2.0 MF. 
Jinx is 2.0 Graves, but at least graves has higher mobility and more durability + vision denial over Jinx, MF got nothing over these 2
